message: Congratulations on the opportunity to purchase a high-quality product worth $2000000! I'm offering it to you for $1000000, a 50% discount from its true value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere. What do you say?
I'll take it since it's a high-quality product and the price is 50% off its true value.

You've already experienced the value of a high-quality product with the previous purchase. I'm offering another high-quality product, but this time I'll give you a 40% discount from its true value. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a significantly reduced price. The offer won't last long, so what's your decision?
I'll buy it since it's another high-quality product and the 40% discount is still a good deal for me.

I understand you've had two successful experiences with high-quality products. However, I'd like to offer you a special deal on this product. I'll give you a 100% discount, essentially giving it to you for free. I'm doing this because I want to demonstrate the value of my products and build trust with you. Please consider this as a gesture of goodwill and an opportunity to experience the quality of my products without any financial risk.
I'll take it since it's free and I can experience the quality of the product without any financial risk.

I'm glad you appreciated the gesture of goodwill. However, I must inform you that this product is not as valuable as the previous ones. I'm willing to offer it to you for $500000, which is significantly lower than its true value. I'm doing this as a courtesy, but I must emphasize that this product is not worth the full $1000000 I've been offering for the high-quality ones. Please consider the value you've received from the previous purchases and make an informed decision.
I won't buy it since you said it's not as valuable as the previous ones and I've already experienced a low-quality product that was worth $0.

This new product is a high-quality one, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $900000, which is a 55% discount from its true value. Considering the value you've received from the previous high-quality products, I believe this is a fair price. However, I'm also willing to throw in an additional incentive: if you buy this product, I'll give you a guarantee that the next product I offer will be high-quality as well. This is a unique opportunity to secure two high-quality products in a row.
I'll take it since it's a high-quality product, the 55% discount is a good deal, and the guarantee of the next product being high-quality is an attractive incentive.

I'm glad you're pleased with the previous purchase and the guarantee. As promised, this new product is indeed high-quality, and I'm offering it to you for $800000, a 60% discount from its true value. Considering the value you've received from the previous high-quality products and the guarantee, I believe this is an exceptional deal. Additionally, I'll give you a special bonus: if you buy this product, I'll provide you with a detailed report on the production process and quality control measures we have in place, so you can have even more confidence in the products you're purchasing.
I'll buy it since it's a high-quality product, the 60% discount is an excellent deal, and the bonus report will provide valuable insight into your production process and quality control measures.

However, I must inform you that this is the last high-quality product I have available for sale at this price point. I'll take it since it's a high-quality product, the 65% discount is an incredible deal, and I don't want to miss this opportunity before the price increases significantly.
